            //(2)å½“å‰é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©ºåˆ™é˜»å¡æŒ‚èµ·
            while (count.get() == 0) {
                notEmpty.await();

            x = dequeue();
            c = count.getAndDecrement();

        if (c == capacity)

        return x;

public boolean remove(Object o) {
    if (o == null) return false;

    //ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰åŒé‡åŠ é”
    fullyLock();
    try {

        //ï¼ˆ2)éå†é˜Ÿåˆ—æ‰¾åˆ™åˆ é™¤è¿”å›true

             p != null;

             //(3)
            if (o.equals(p.item)) {
                unlink(p, trail);
                return true;
            }
        }
        //(4)æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¿”å›false
        return false;
    } finally {
        //(5)è§£é”
        fullyUnlock();

}

ã€€ã€€void unlink(Node<E> p, Node<E> trail) {
